channel.title: iDigital

item.title: Microsoft’s new Magnetic-One system directs multiple AI agents to complete user tasks
item.description: Magnetic-One, Microsoft's AI agent orchestration framework, deploys multiple agents to solve daily tasks autonomously.

item.title: What a second Trump term means for retirement
item.description: Congress may have more impact than the president when it comes to retirement.

item.title: ‘It strikes me as vengeful’: My friend wants to boycott a coffee shop because of the owner’s political views. Is this what America has become?
item.description: “There was a pile-on of hate and jubilance at the thought of putting this man out of business.”

item.title: Tesla’s stock is soaring on Trump’s win. Here’s why Wall Street is so upbeat.
item.description: CEO Elon Musk has close ties to Trump. Plus, Tesla could benefit from potential higher Chinese tariffs, an analyst says.

item.title: AIRIS is a learning AI teaching itself how to play Minecraft
item.description: An AI named AIRIS is engaging in self-directed learning inside of Minecraft, teaching itself how to play and theoretically becoming efficient at it.

item.title: Knowledge workers are leaning on generative AI as their workloads mount
item.description: A recent Thomson Reuters report found that the average knowledge worker expects AI to save them four hours per week.
